mapper.sql: ReVisitId, order_id AS orderId, house_id AS houseId, nanny_id AS nannyId, train_id AS trainId, ReVisitDate, ReVisitStatus, Remark, createtime, modifytime, createid, modifyid, isDel, VisitType, Assess, AssessContent
mapper.select: SELECT ose.ReVisitId AS ReVisitId, ose.ReVisitDate AS ReVisitDate, ose.ReVisitStatus AS ReVisitStatus, ose.VisitType AS VisitType, ose.house_address AS house_address, ose.shop_id AS shop_id, ose.shop_name AS shop_name, ose.mission_id AS mission_id , GROUP_CONCAT(ni.nanny_name) AS nanny_name, ose.mission_time AS mission_time FROM ( SELECT rvo.ReVisitId, rvo.ReVisitDate, rvo.ReVisitStatus, rvo.VisitType, ch.house_address, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, os.mission_id, os.mission_time FROM re_visit_order rvo LEFT JOIN order_small os ON rvo.order_id = os.order_id LEFT JOIN shop s ON os.shop_id = s.shop_id LEFT JOIN customer_house ch ON os.house_id = ch.house_id WHERE os.mission_date >= rvo.ReVisitDate AND rvo.ReVisitDate <= #{date} AND rvo.nanny_id = #{nanny_id} AND rvo.ReVisitStatus = 1 AND rvo.isDel = 0 AND os.isDel = 0 AND os.mission_status = 1 GROUP BY rvo.order_id ) AS ose LEFT JOIN order_small_nanny osn ON ose.mission_id = osn.mission_id LEFT JOIN nanny_info ni ON osn.nanny_id = ni.nanny_id GROUP BY osn.mission_id ORDER BY ose.mission_time,ose.ReVisitDate
mapper.update: UPDATE re_visit_order SET Assess = #{Assess}, AssessContent = #{AssessContent}, nanny_id = #{nanny_id}, ReVisitStatus = #{ReVisitStatus}, mission_id = #{mission_id} WHERE ReVisitId = #{ReVisitId}
